text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- High committee to meet in Rabat on November 25 over cooperation between Tunisia and Morocco.
- A 1,700-strong naval NATO force to visit the Moroccan city of Casablanca on September 12.
- Moroccan athlete Hicham el Guerrouj takes his revenge by beating Algerian Noureddine Morceli.
- Morocco's farmers' union calls for "Yes" vote in the referendum on constitutional reforms on September 13.
- Spanish coastguards arrest 54 people from North African countries near Tarifa as they tried to enter Spain illegally.
- Leaders of the National Rally of Independents hold meetings across Morocco to urge supporters to vote "Yes" for constitutional reforms.
